plot: Follows a group of students at Upper Redwood High who have a radio show called Radio Active. Chaos follows as the group try to work together and watching out for the sneaky Ms. Noelle Atoll...
plot_en: Follows a group of students at Upper Redwood High who have a radio show called Radio Active. Chaos follows as the group try to work together and watching out for the sneaky Ms. Noelle Atoll...

title: Radio Active
